list_definition.definition: a short, sharp sound, like that of a light-switch being turned on
to (cause to) make such a sound

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The soldier clicked his heels together
The gate clicked shut behind her.

list_ex_of_english: At any time the meaning of one word can be looked up by clicking on it.
83 are clicks, and 13 of the rest have double releases.
Values from each of the three levels are consulted to determine whether each cicada sings, chirps, or clicks, or whether it is inactive.
